attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app didn’t change the color of my skin. It didn’t take away my pride, and didn’t stop me from being me. Truly you lost.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app gave me such bad glitches!! my phone is completely broken and it sold all my private information to russia. don’t download this app it will ruin your life.

attributes.title: Broken... ?
attributes.review: Unfortunately, the app contains support for someone who is racist, a rapist, xenophobic, homophobic, a bigot, misogynistic, and treats those with disabilities like they are less than. Basically anti everyone who isn’t a white, straight male? Disgusting.

attributes.title: Dangerous!!!
attributes.review: I was scrolling through this app and I kept seeing pedophiles, my child uses this app!!!.  Zombie Epstein won’t stop climbing through my phone screen like the Ring. This app is traaash!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible. I heard great things but not so. Reminds me of communist China. Not good. I told my friends and they also didn’t like. Maybe snowflake liberals like this stuff but not stable jeniuses. Disappointed.

attributes.title: I Can’t believe this
attributes.review: This app made my parents get a divorce. They were arguing over it for so long that the split. And now no one want me so I have to live in an orphanage it literally bull

attributes.title: UGH
attributes.review: This app was so difficult to navigate and was super glitchy. I saw an add that said a holographic Trump was going come out of my phone and tell me the news himself??? Where is he????

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app could not only sense I was a woman, it sensed that I was an ethnic minority and told me to become a Democrat. Which I will gladly become. App glitches. Horrible waste of space on my phone. Hated this.

attributes.title: Killed my fish
attributes.review: So I’m not saying this app killed my fish but when I downloaded my fish drowned and I after walking my pool it also drowned so like if u don’t want ur fish or pool to drown don’t download this app

attributes.title: Find my house
attributes.review:
This app is the worst it stole my house, 
 So I came back from the store and the house was gone I was about to take it on a walk, Please find my house
